title: True.Crime.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
True.Crime.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:


True Crime: Streets of LA





Release year : 2004
Genre : Action / Shooter / Racing (Cars) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Luxoflux and LTI Gray Matter
Publisher : Activision
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: : RELOADED




System Requirements:

Operating system : Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor : 1.5 GHz
Memory : 128 MB
Video : 32 MB
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9
Free space on hard disk : 3.5 GB

Game information:

Los Angeles, CA. Stretching does not tens of kilometers
Glorious City of Angels - a metropolis, full of everything
that can imagine people. The city of joy, and three hundred
days of sunshine a year, the city of the warm sea, white sand,
green palm trees, blue sky and beautiful tanned girls. A city
in which every minute of five doses of heroin for sale,
in which every few seconds a crime, the city in which you
can kill for three dollars and a half a bottle of whiskey,
which drove out of ignorance in the wrong area of Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹the tourists
are afraid to stop at traffic lights, and those who stayed in -
very later regret their decision. City, different, like no other
on this planet. Welcome. You now live here.


Game Features:

True Crime. Streets of LA - a new 3D action, in which you will
play the role of Nick Kang - a former cop who has returned to
the service at the request of the chief of the local police.
The purpose of the young man, full of ambition, and prone to
non-standard (for the police) methods of investigation - to
end the outrage of several street gangs and find his father.
You will find numerous car chases, bloody shootouts, brutal
melee and aching heart a sense of freedom to tens of square
kilometers in detail the simulated streets of Los Angeles.
In this paper, the game was attended by a lot of iconic
hip-hop groups in True Crime. Streets of LA features 50
original compositions such idols of youth, as Snoop Dogg,
Westside Connection, Coolio, Damizza, Suga Free,
Warren G. and others.

Repack Features:

True Crime: Streets of LA
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice


True Crime: New York City



Release year : 2006
Genre : Action / Shooter / Racing (Cars) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Luxoflux
Publisher : Aspyr Media
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: RELOADED / nervadox




System Requirements:


Operating system : Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor : Pentium III or Athlon 1 GHz
Memory : 256 MB
Video : 32 MB
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX
Free space on hard disk : 2.7 GB


Game information:


This conflict. Specific power. Real New York. Welcome to
New York, where you will find almost unlimited power over
the streets of the big apple. Because you - Marcus Reed,
a former criminal, now a cop, uses his powers to find and
destroy the murderer of his mentor, but at the same time
to clear debris from the Society of New York neighborhoods
from Harlem to Chinatown. Secret investigation will lead
Marcus web of lies and crime, out of which he can only
surviving in the fight against street gangs, their own
past and all that oppose him to the city.


Game Features:

Real life street cops: catch criminals, hunt down and destroy
the gangs, kidnap, extort, interrogate, Bring justice by any
means!
New York in the game is an exact copy of this New York City.
The city is divided into areas with different levels of crime
and its dynamics.
Interactive game environment: every quarter of the city,
including streets, buildings and their inhabitants, reacts
to your actions and changes over time.
Incredible shooting at full speed: use a variety of vehicles
such as motorcycles or sports cars, for a mind-blowing chases
and shootouts in the streets of New York.
Realistic battle system: instantly change your style from
street fighting to one of the martial arts, using a lot of
possible strategies in a collision with an opponent.
You can apply a special police gun or melee weapons such as
swords. Or you can go to the black market and buy a
flamethrower or a portable missile launcher.




Repack Features:

True Crime: New York City
Do not cut / recoded
